t: An Earnest Appeal for Guidance and Deliverance
Hear*pn my prayer, O Lord,*s Give*ld ear to my supplications! In*ld Your faithfulness answer me, And*ild in Your righteousness.
Do*ld not enter into judgment with Your servant, For*ld in Your sight no one living is righteous.
For*ln the enemy has persecuted my soul; He*ld has crushed my life to the ground; He*ld has made me dwell in darkness, Like*ld those who have long been dead.
Therefore*ld my spirit is overwhelmed within me; My*ld heart within me is distressed.
I*ln remember the days of old; I*ld meditate on all Your works; I*ld muse on the work of Your hands.
I*ld spread out my hands to You; My*ld soul longs*i for You like a thirsty land. Selah*ipg
Answer*pn me speedily, O Lord;*s My*ld spirit fails! Do*ld not hide Your face from me, Lest*ld I be like those who go down into the pit.
Cause*ld me to hear Your lovingkindness in the morning, For*ld in You do I trust; Cause*ld me to know the way in which I should walk, For*ld I lift up my soul to You.
Deliver*ln me, O Lord,*s from my enemies; In*ld You I take shelter.
Teach*ld me to do Your will, For*ld You are*i my God; Your*ld Spirit is*i good. Lead*ld me in the land of uprightness.
Revive*ln me, O Lord,*s for Your name’s sake! For*ld Your righteousness’ sake bring my soul out of trouble.
In*ld Your mercy cut off my enemies, And*ld destroy all those who afflict my soul; For*ld I am*i Your servant.
